items.title: 4 killed in NYC office shooting, gunman appeared to be targeting NFL
items.description: The 27-year-old man who shot and killed four people at a Midtown office building on Monday carried a note in his pocket, police sources told ABC News.

items.title: Sean Combs' lawyers ask judge to release him from jail while awaiting sentencing
items.description: Combs is scheduled to be sentenced on Oct. 3. on two counts of transportation to engage in prostitution.

items.title: What to know about CTE, the brain disease, after NYC gunman's claims
items.description: Chronic traumatic encephalopathy, or CTE, is a brain disease linked to repeated hits to the head, often seen in military veterans and athletes.

items.title: WATCH:  What we know about midtown Manhattan shooting suspect
items.description: Shane Devon Tamura has been identified as the man who allegedly shot and killed four people at a Midtown Manhattan office building on Monday.

items.title: WATCH:  Fighter jet in 'close call' with flock of birds
items.description: A Spanish air force pilot performed a maneuver to avoid a flock of birds during the International Air Festival in Gijon.
